prompt.description: The text description of the scene, subject, or action to generate in the video.

video_url.description: A HTTPS URL pointing to a video or a data URI containing a video. This video will be used as a reference during generation.

image_list.description: Array of image URLs for multi-image-to-video generation.

reference_image_urls.description: Additional reference images from different angles.

frontal_image_url.description: The frontal image of the element (main view).

elements.description: Elements (characters/objects) to include in the video.

keep_audio.description: Whether to keep the original audio from the video.

id.description: The ID of the generated video.

status.description: The current status of the generation task.

url.description: The URL where the file can be downloaded from.

error.description: Description of the error, if any.

credits_used.description: The number of tokens consumed during generation.

x-codeSamples.source:
curl -L \
  --request POST \
  --url 'https://api.aimlapi.com/v2/video/generations' \
  --header 'Authorization: Bearer <YOUR_AIMLAPI_KEY>' \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --data '{
      "model": "klingai/video-o1-video-to-video-edit",
      "video_url": "https://zovi0.github.io/public_misc/kling-v2-master-t2v-racoon.mp4",
      "prompt": "Add a small fairy as a rider on the raccoon’s back. She must have a black-and-golden face and a cloak in the colors of a dark emerald tropical butterfly with bright blue shimmering spots."
    }'
